title: Stickmaschinen & Ink/Stitch Meetup
description:
We want to get together, talk about our experiences with Ink/Stitch and machine embroidery, show off projects and network.

There is no agenda, we'll just sit down together and see what we feel like talking about.

Ink/Stitch is a plugin for Inkscape that can be used to design embroidery patterns for machine embroidery.

Time and place might change, please come back at 16:00 on Day 1 to confirm!
